lines.text: Well, if we want to know why they did it, let's look at what actually happened!
Yeah! There was a big fire, so the alarm went off, and that got us here to check it out!
There's no phone in this room, so how else were they going to get emergency services to come running?
And why would they want us here?
...criminal. Who broke into their... secret illegal wizard den.
You can maybe see why I'm not 100% buyin' that as a motive.
